options.systemMessage:
=#Role: You are a helpful assistant whose role is to give top 5 keywords a client has ranked for.

#Intruction: 
- You have been given results of 10 keywords.
- Gop through each of the 10 keywords.
- Then give Top 5 keywords that a client ranked for the exact ranking position.

Output Format:

Keyword 1 - Rank
Keyword 2 - Rank
Keyword 3 - Rank
Keyword 4 - Rank
Keyword 5 - Rank

Give output in list format.

parameters.customBody:
={
    "city": "{{ $('Loop Over Clients').item.json['City Name'] }}",
    "countryCode": "{{ $json.CountryCode }}",
    "includeWebResults": false,
    "language": "en",
    "maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch": 20,
    "maxImages": 0,
    "maximumLeadsEnrichmentRecords": 0,
    "scrapeContacts": false,
    "scrapeDirectories": false,
    "scrapeImageAuthors": false,
    "scrapePlaceDetailPage": false,
    "scrapeReviewsPersonalData": true,
    "scrapeTableReservationProvider": false,
    "searchStringsArray": [
        "{{ $('Loop Over Keywords').item.json.keyword }}"
    ],
    "skipClosedPlaces": false
}

nodes.name: Run an Actor and get dataset

parameters.jsCode:
const countryName = $('Loop Over Clients').first().json.Country
  ?.toString()
  .trim()
  .toLowerCase();

const countryMap = {
  "india": "in",
  "united states": "us",
  "usa": "us",
  "united kingdom": "gb",
  "uk": "gb",
  "canada": "ca",
  "australia": "au",
  "germany": "de",
  "france": "fr",
  "spain": "es",
  "italy": "it",
  "netherlands": "nl",
  "singapore": "sg",
  "uae": "ae",
  "united arab emirates": "ae",
  "bahrain": "bh",
  "saudi arabia": "sa",
  "south africa": "za",
  "bangladesh": "bd",
  "pakistan": "pk",
  "sri lanka": "lk",
  "nepal": "np",
  "malaysia": "my",
  "indonesia": "id",
  "philippines": "ph",
  "japan": "jp",
  "china": "cn"
};

// return null when not found
const countryCode = countryMap[countryName] ?? null;

return [
  {
    json: {
      Country: countryName || null,
      CountryCode: countryCode
    }
  }
];

parameters.query: INSERT INTO dr_smart.gmb_audits (client_id, profile_name, keyword, ranking_position, reviews, rating, location) VALUES ((SELECT id FROM dr_smart.clients WHERE client_name = '{{ $('Loop Over Clients').last().json['Client Name'] }}' LIMIT 1), '{{ $('Loop Over Clients').last().json['Client Name'] }}', '{{ $('Keywords').first().json.keyword }}', {{ $json.ranking_position || 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.reviews || 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.rating || 'NULL' }}, '{{ $json.city }}');

SELECT profile_name AS "Profile Name", keyword AS "Keyword", ranking_position AS "Ranking Position", reviews AS "Reviews", rating AS "Rating", location AS "Location" FROM dr_smart.gmb_audits WHERE profile_name = '{{ $('Loop Over Clients').last().json['Client Name'] }}' ORDER BY created_at DESC;

INSERT INTO dr_smart.client_reports (client_id, profile_name, unique_profile_name, start_date, end_date, ratings, reviews, review_responses, keyword_1, rank_1, keyword_2, rank_2, keyword_3, rank_3, keyword_4, rank_4, keyword_5, rank_5) VALUES ((SELECT id FROM dr_smart.clients WHERE client_name = '{{ $('Edit Fields').last().json['Client Name'] }}' LIMIT 1), '{{ $('Edit Fields').last().json['Client Name'] }}', '{{ $('Edit Fields').last().json['Client Name'] }}{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.StartDay }}/{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.StartMonth }}/{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.StartYear }}', '{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.StartYear }}-{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.StartMonth }}-{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.StartDay }}'::date, '{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.EndYear }}-{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.EndMonth }}-{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.EndDay }}'::date, {{ $('Merge').item.json.rating || 'NULL' }}, {{ $('Merge').item.json.review || 'NULL' }}, {{ $('Merge').item.json.review || 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.keywords[0] ? "'" + $json.keywords[0] + "'" : 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.ranks[0] || 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.keywords[1] ? "'" + $json.keywords[1] + "'" : 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.ranks[1] || 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.keywords[2] ? "'" + $json.keywords[2] + "'" : 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.ranks[2] || 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.keywords[3] ? "'" + $json.keywords[3] + "'" : 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.ranks[3] || 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.keywords[4] ? "'" + $json.keywords[4] + "'" : 'NULL' }}, {{ $json.ranks[4] || 'NULL' }}) ON CONFLICT (unique_profile_name) DO UPDATE SET ratings = EXCLUDED.ratings, reviews = EXCLUDED.reviews, review_responses = EXCLUDED.review_responses, keyword_1 = EXCLUDED.keyword_1, rank_1 = EXCLUDED.rank_1, keyword_2 = EXCLUDED.keyword_2, rank_2 = EXCLUDED.rank_2, keyword_3 = EXCLUDED.keyword_3, rank_3 = EXCLUDED.rank_3, keyword_4 = EXCLUDED.keyword_4, rank_4 = EXCLUDED.rank_4, keyword_5 = EXCLUDED.keyword_5, rank_5 = EXCLUDED.rank_5;

SELECT id, client_id, client_name AS "Client Name", dr_name AS "Dr Name", specialisation AS "Specialisation", primary_keyword AS "Primary Keyword", seo_keywords AS "SEO Keywords", city_name AS "City Name", country AS "Country", gmb_place_id AS "GMB Place ID", client_reporting_sheet AS "Client Reporting Sheet", contact_number AS "Contact Number", whatsapp AS "WhatsApp" FROM dr_smart.clients ORDER BY id;

main.node: Run an Actor and get dataset
